author: andrius-k
body:
#### PR description:

This is a backport of #30357 and #30592 to 11_1_3. This code is required to run the new DQM GUI during the upcoming MWGR.

This is planned to be merged.

#### PR validation:

PR was validated in the P5 playback system.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport of #30357 and #30592.
title: DQM: Code in preparation to the ucoming MWGR
